page.title: 15Huntley Village Hall
page.content: The focal point for social activities in Huntley is the Village Hall.It is run by a committee of nineteen people. The hall is used by many different groups and clubs such as karate, Playgroup,Football,Mothers'Union, Thursday Group,Autumn Club and Women's Institute. There is plenty of entertainment such as table tennis,snooker,table football,darts and lots more. The committee looks after the hall and car park,but not the adjoining playing fields.The thing that brings in the most money is the bar. The Village Hall is also used for disco,dances,jumble sales,birthday parties,wedding receptions,fashion shows,fund-raising events,private parties,auctions and County Council elections.
